summary:
## Triangles: The Basics

A triangle is a shape with three corners (vertices) and three sides (edges). The sum of its internal angles is always 180 degrees. Triangles can be classified by their angles and side lengths. We can find their area by multiplying the height by the base and dividing by 2. Triangles are important in geometry and can be found in many different types of spaces, even curved ones.
title: Triangle
